We're training hard to prepare for the worst case scenario.

id: Card - Symboli Rudolf Random The Student Council President's Thoughtfulness

options.option_text: Thanks! Now no storm will rain on our parade.
It must be tough always looking out for the school.

id: Card - Seiun Sky Random Recruiting Cat Catchers

options.option_text: Just wait in a sunny spot.
